description.english: Conquer the Temple and unlock the Base function
description.japanese: 仏堂を攻略して基地をアンロックする
description.schinese: 攻占佛堂并解锁基地功能
description.tchinese: 攻占佛堂並解鎖基地功能

description.english: Unlock the statue of Infinite Arhat
description.japanese: 無量尊者の仏像をアンロックする

description.english: Unlock the statue of Carousing Acalantha
description.japanese: 神飲明王の仏像をアンロックする

description.english: Unlock the statue of Bitter River Bodhi
description.schinese: 解锁三川苦寒菩萨佛像
description.tchinese: 解鎖三川苦寒菩薩佛像
description.japanese: 三川苦寒菩萨の仏像をアンロックする

description.english: Unlock the statue of Thunderfury Vajra
description.schinese: 解锁圣威怒雷金刚佛像
description.tchinese: 解鎖聖威怒雷金剛佛像
description.japanese: 圣威怒雷金剛の仏像をアンロックする

description.english: Unlock the statue of Mother Trinity
description.schinese: 解锁三尸慈姑娘娘佛像
description.tchinese: 解鎖三屍慈姑娘娘佛像
description.japanese: 三尸慈姑娘娘の仏像をアンロックする

description.english: Kill Lu Kunhai the Swine Lord
description.japanese: 豕家の主・コンハイを倒す

description.english: Kill Sima Ying the Crane Lord
description.japanese: 鶴家の主・シバエイを倒す

description.english: Kill Zhao Changgeng the Turtle
description.japanese: 龜家の主・チョウコウを倒す

description.english: Kill Qin Wu the Tiger Lord
description.japanese: 虎家の主・シンブを倒す

description.english: Kill Ji Xia the Dragon Emperor
description.japanese: 竜武帝・キカを倒す

description.english: Reach the normal ending
description.japanese: ノーマルエンディングを迎える

description.english: Reach the end of activating the seal
description.japanese: 封印解除のエンディングを迎える

description.english: Clear the Medium Snow difficulty
description.japanese: 小雪難度でゲームをクリアする

description.english: Clear the Heavy Snow difficulty
description.japanese: 大雪難度でゲームをクリアする

description.english: Clear the Snow Storm difficulty
description.japanese: 豪雪難度でゲームをクリアする

description.english: Clear the Blizzard difficulty
description.japanese: 吹雪難度でゲームをクリアする

displayName.japanese: 黒い糸は銀色の雪になる

description.english: Unlock the story of Qing and Yi
description.japanese: 「青と逸」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of A Swine's Ambition
description.japanese: 「猪の野心」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of Missing Mother and Sibling Bond
description.japanese: 「帰らない母と寄り添う二人」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of The Serpent and the Dragon
description.japanese: 「蛇と竜」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of The Winter Solstice Fire
description.japanese: 「立冬の炎」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of The Longwu Mystery
description.japanese: 「竜武の異象」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of Coming of the White Lotus
description.japanese: 「白蓮咲く」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of “Warm Snow”
description.japanese: 「『暖雪』」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of Mother Trinity Sect
description.japanese: 「慈母教」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of The Hidden Truth
description.schinese: 解锁[隐藏的真相]的故事
description.tchinese: 解鎖[隱藏的真相]的故事
description.japanese: 「隠された真相」を解放する

description.english: Unlock the story of Hope Amidst Despair
description.schinese: 解锁[绝望中的希望]的故事
description.tchinese: 解鎖[絕望中的希望]的故事
description.japanese: 「絶望の中の希望」を解放する

displayName.japanese: それぞれの計画を持つ

description.english: Unlock the story of Despair Amidst Hope
description.schinese: 解锁[希望中的绝望]的故事
description.tchinese: 解鎖[希望中的絕望]的故事
description.japanese: 「希望の中の絶望」を解放する

description.english: Unlock all the hidden stories
description.japanese: 全ての隠しストーリーを解放する

description.japanese: 8種類の神兵を使う

description.japanese: 18種類の神兵を使う

description.japanese: 28種類の神兵を使う

description.japanese: 43種類の神兵を使う

description.japanese: 500体の敵を倒す

description.japanese: 1000体の敵を倒す

description.japanese: 2000体の敵を倒す

description.japanese: 5000体の敵を倒す

description.english: Kill 10000 enemies
description.japanese: 10000体の敵を倒す

description.english: Deal 500 damage in a single attack
description.japanese: 1回の攻撃で500以上のダメージを与える

description.english: Use 28 Red Souls in [Remembrance - Life]
description.schinese: 在记忆赎还·命中投入28点红色的灵魂
description.tchinese: 在記憶贖還·命中投入28點紅色的靈魂
description.japanese: [記憶伝承・命]に28個の赤い魂を使う

description.schinese: 在记忆赎还·杀中投入28点红色的灵魂

description.japanese: [記憶伝承・殺]に28個の赤い魂を使う

description.schinese: 在记忆赎还·炼中投入28点红色的灵魂
description.tchinese: 在記憶贖還·煉中投入28點紅色的靈魂
description.japanese: [記憶伝承・錬]に28個の赤い魂を使う

displayName.english: Hey, This Thing Can Be Smashed

description.japanese: 100個の可破壊物を壊す

description.japanese: 300個の可破壊物を壊す

description.japanese: 1000個の可破壊物を壊す

description.japanese: 2000個の可破壊物を壊す

description.english: Die the 1st time
description.japanese: 初めて敗れる

description.english: Die 10 times
description.japanese: 10回敗れる

displayName.english: People die if they are killed ……
displayName.japanese: 人は殺されれば死ぬんだ…

description.english: Die 50 times
description.japanese: 50回敗れる

displayName.japanese: ゴールデン…レジェンド？

description.english: Get the orange Relic the 1st time
description.japanese: 初めて橙色聖物を得る

description.english: Distill the Relic and get the red Relic
description.schinese: 精炼武器获得红色武器
description.tchinese: 精煉武器獲得紅色武器
description.japanese: 聖物を錬成して赤色聖物を得る

displayName.japanese: それはいいが、意味なし

description.english: Have Indomitable and Hurricane in a single game
description.schinese: 同时拥有[不动如山]和[疾风骤雨]
description.tchinese: 同時擁有[不動如山]和[疾風驟雨]
description.japanese: 同時に「山の如く」と「疾風驟雨」を得る

description.english: Complete a single game without using Herbal Gourd
description.schinese: 不使用药葫芦通关一次游戏
description.tchinese: 不使用藥葫蘆通關一次遊戲
description.japanese: 薬ひょうたんを使用せずにゲームをクリアする

displayName.english: My dart is full of poison!
displayName.schinese: 我这飞镖可是沾满剧毒的
displayName.tchinese: 我這飛鏢可是沾滿劇毒的
displayName.japanese: 毒まみれのダーツだぞ

description.english: Killed by Shadow Servant
description.japanese: 影侍に倒される

description.english: Killed by Sick Pig
description.japanese: 病気の豚に倒される

description.english: Killed by  Self-destruct Device
description.japanese: 自爆装置に倒される

description.english: Killed by Concubine Jade
description.japanese: ギョク貴妃に倒される

description.english: Hear all the lines of Sima Yue
description.schinese: 听完司马玥的全部台词
description.tchinese: 聽完司馬玥的全部臺詞
description.japanese: シバユエの全部のセリフを聞く

description.english: Accepting the trial of 'Do not stop!', after then reach the end
description.schinese: 激活劝君莫停试炼后通关
description.tchinese: 啟動勸君莫停試煉後通關
description.japanese: 「止まらないで！」の試練を受けてゲームをクリアする

displayName.english: Stepping On The Snow, Leaving No Trails

description.english: Accepting the trial of 'Stepping On The Snow, Leaving No Trails', after then reach the end
description.schinese: 激活以瞬代步试炼后通关
description.tchinese: 啟動以瞬代步試煉後通關
description.japanese: 「跡形もなく」の試練を受けてゲームをクリアする

description.english: Accepting the trial of 'Detoxification of Bloodsucking', after then reach the end
description.schinese: 激活贪婪吞噬试炼后通关
description.tchinese: 啟動貪婪吞噬試煉後通關
description.japanese: 「吸血依存症」の試練を受けてゲームをクリアする

description.english: Accepting the trial of 'Confront The Fear', after then reach the end
description.schinese: 激活颤栗梦魇试炼后通关
description.tchinese: 啟動顫慄夢魘試煉後通關
description.japanese: 「恐怖に立ち向か」の試練を受けてゲームをクリアする

description.english: Accepting the trial of 'Cut Pauranaj Karma into Halves', after then reach the end

description.tchinese: 啟動屍山血海試煉後通關
description.japanese: 「宿業両断」の試練を受けてゲームをクリアする

description.english: Accepting the trial of 'Flammable and Explosive', after then reach the end

description.tchinese: 啟動天干物燥試煉後通關

description.japanese: 「ブレードマスター」の試練を受けてゲームをクリアする

description.english: Accepting the trial of 'Fortitude', after then reach the end

description.japanese: 「剛毅不屈」の試練を受けてゲームをクリアする

description.tchinese: 啟動赤紅血疫試煉後通關
description.japanese: 「その場で爆発！」の試練を受けてゲームをクリアする
